title: Wolf Quest (WOLF ROLEPLAY 3D)
description:
Here it is, many of you already know and some don't, The WolfQuest! This is a RPG-related 3D Graphic game where you create your own wolf and start a new adventure (online doesn't work, even it says so) you start as a wolf in a BIG world in the western-sphere, you can interact with other wolves or attack bears as your enemies, you can go and hunt, howl so other wolves may come to you, you need to stay put though some wolves might attack you! You can start your own pack, get a female-wolf and venture around the wilderness to hunt for food or to protect your pack, you can also LAN with your friends in this epic wolfquest world!
System Requirements:

Minimum:
Proccesor: 1.5GHz (Pentium III or AMD)
RAM: 256MB
Graphics DirectX9.0c 32MB (nVidia Geforce 2MX and up, ATI oldish and Up)
Sounds: DirectX 9.0 support (For the perfect and the most beautiful howl)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Recommended:
Proccesor: 2.0GHz (Pentium 4)
RAM: 512MB
Graphics: DirectX9.0c 64MB (nVidia Gefore 4 Fx and up, ATI 9000 and up)
Sounds: ---->Same As Minimum<----
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEST quality (without lagg)
Proccesor: Dual Core 2.5GHz
RAM: 2GB
Graphics: DirectX 10.0 (Well, the newest drivers for nVidia Geforce 6900FX and up, ATI equal for nVidia)
Sounds: SoundBlaster (same as Recommended and Minimun, except the attacks may sound)

Any problems? (You wont have any problems because this is completley finished installed and 100% working) BUT, if you got any problems post below and i will answer and/or fix it as soon as possible!

Take Care! DO NOT forget to seed.
